short_summary: Hydraulic Press with Heated Platens for carbon fibre and glass fibre reinforced thermoplastic polymer composites fabrication.
description: The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking to acquire a hydraulic press with heated platens for its activities related to the fabrication of carbon fibre and glass fibre reinforced thermoplastic polymer composites. The requirements must include the installation, training, manuals, maintenance, and support. The Hydraulic press must meet the following specifications: The hydraulic press should have heated platens.
